level.heading: Establishment of the donor registry.
level.text: There is established a donor registry for residents of the District of Columbia, which shall be maintained by the federally designated organ procurement organization serving the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 7-1531.01 and § 7-1531.19f.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 20 of the Revised Uniform Anatomical Gift Act (2006).
